tool_description: Calculates total portfolio value, individual asset values, and portfolio composition metrics using current market prices.

asset_symbols.description: Array of cryptocurrency symbols in portfolio

current_prices.description: Current market prices for each asset

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_symbols, asset_quantities, and current_prices arrays must have the same length.
Invalid quantity value: Asset quantities must be positive numbers.
Invalid price value: Current prices must be positive numbers.
Calculation overflow: Portfolio value exceeds maximum calculable amount.
usage: Provide matching arrays of asset_symbols, asset_quantities, and current_prices. Specify base_currency if different from USD. Returns comprehensive portfolio valuation metrics.

total_portfolio_value.description: Total portfolio value in base currency

individual_asset_values.description: Value of each individual asset holding

percentage_allocations.description: Percentage allocation of each asset in portfolio

largest_holding_symbol.description: Symbol of the largest holding by value

concentration_ratio.description: Percentage of portfolio in top 3 holdings
